name: documentSolutionTables
friendlyName: Mightora Power Platform Table Documentation Generator
description: This PowerShell script is designed to automate the documentation of Dataverse entities. It parses Entity.xml files found within a specified root directory, extracts information about each entity, including its attributes and their respective properties, and generates detailed Markdown documentation for each entity. This process facilitates a better understanding and management of Dataverse entities by providing an easily accessible and readable format for their schema and properties.
author: mightoraio
